attributes.action: investigate the shortcomings of the social services dept of Haringey council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the tragic death of yet another child under supervision of Haringey officials it appears as though no one will lose their jobs. It is about time someone was made responsible for this and it is the governments resposibility to ensure this is carried out as soon as possible. This petition is to show the strength of feelings amongst the general public that someone or persons should lose their job over this appalling tradegy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
